email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 15,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. Could you provide us with a freight rate and available vessel options? We are targeting a laycan of November 20-25, 2023.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 25,000 and LOA of 180m, for your shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 25/MT on a CIF basis. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for the offer. However, we were hoping for a rate closer to USD 22/MT. Could you negotiate this with the shipowner? Additionally, could you confirm the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

After negotiation, the shipowner has agreed to a reduced rate of USD 23/MT. The vessel is expected to arrive in Rotterdam on December 10, 2023, assuming loading is completed within the laycan. Please confirm your acceptance of these terms.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

We accept the revised rate of USD 23/MT and the laycan of November 20-25, 2023. Please proceed with finalizing the charter party agreement. Could you also confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your confirmation. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day pro rata. I will send over the charter party agreement for your review shortly.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Shipment of 15,000MT Coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Maria,

We have reviewed and accepted the charter party agreement. Please proceed with the final arrangements. Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
Alex
